title: Step Functions to Athena
description: Create a Step Functions workflow to query Amazon Athena.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to setup AWS S3 Object Lambda to invoke Amazon Textract. Amazon Textract can be used on a Object Lambda Access point to provide the extract of a document PDF / Image

bullets.text: Transforming S3 Objects with S3 Object Lambda
Analyzing Document Text with Amazon Textract

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Hemish Soni
authors.bio: Sr Partner Solution Architect, Serverless Enthusiast
